document_data.mainbody:
Cathan doom radishes were a type of vegetable that grew on the planet HCatha. They were considered a savory food and were particularly enjoyed by the githyanki.
In the late 15 century DR, crates of HCathan doom radishes were stored in Stardock for the consumption of the githyanki population of Cr√®che Kliir. They were regularly brought to the station by trading spelljammers and githyanki astral ships.
